DOC.brief_summary: Dry eye syndrome ( DES ) common ocular disease , especially elderly population . Despite many treatment approach , instillation topical lubricant remain mainstay therapy . However , topical lubricant available well characterize data efficacy sparse . The aim present project investigate effect topically administer Olixia pure® eye drop tear film thickness healthy subject . Tear film thickness determine use ultra high-resolution optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) . Measurements perform instillation eye drop every 10 minute instillation one hour . One eye receive Olixia pure® eye drop , fellow eye receive physiologic saline solution placebo control . The study eye choose randomly .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Olixia Pure® Eye Drops Tear Film Thickness Healthy Subjects
